text: Michael Nushöhr (born 14 August 1962) is a German retired footballer who played as a defender. He appeared at the 1981 FIFA World Youth Championship.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:German footballers Category:SSV Ulm 1846 players Category:1.
